channel.title: Cloudflare on Coding Blog By Arnab Shil
channel.description: Recent content in Cloudflare on Coding Blog By Arnab Shil

item.title: Rollout your Google fonts faster with Cloudflare Cache
item.description: If you are already using Cloudflare, you know that Cloudflare caches fonts (and other contents). But it won’t work if you are using Google font’s CDN. Cloudflare has a detailed guide on how to improve Google fonts performance, but it heavily relies on workers, which might cost a lot of money if your website has a lot of users.
